attributes.action: Descreation of graves in Syria- morally and ethically wrong. Violation of human rights.
attributes.additional_details: To voice their disapproval at the horrific, vile and inhumane actions taken by rebels to desecrate and remove remains of dead bodies. It is a gross injustice and a crime against defenceless victims. The only purpose will be to create more disunity and hatred amongst Syrian civilians.
